title: Quick POC
shortDescription: Iterate from idea to working prototype in 3-5 days.
description: A fast-paced playbook for building proof-of-concept prototypes. Validate feasibility, UX, and technical approach before committing to full development. Includes PRD scoping, technical design, implementation planning, UX review, feasibility assessment, and legal/IP considerations.

prompts.note: Define POC scope: problem, goals, core features, and constraints. Keep it lean - this feeds into the tech design.
Design minimal architecture. Paste PRD summary into 'PRD or App Description' input. Focus on speed over perfection.
Generate step-by-step build plan. Paste PRD and tech design summaries as inputs. Defines what to build vs. skip.
Review the built POC against requirements. Paste PRD user stories and describe what was built. Identifies quick wins.
Assess feasibility and risks. Set stage to 'POC validation'. Paste PRD and tech summaries. Get go/no-go recommendation.
Review licensing, IP, and compliance. Paste tech stack and data sources. Identifies blockers before scaling.

prerequisites: A clear idea or problem to validate
Access to necessary APIs/services for POC
